=======
History
=======

0.3.0 (2017-05-30)
------------------

- Accept (but ignore) version strings with leading 'v' or '=' characters


0.2.0 (2017-05-24)
------------------

- Add support for pre-release versions


0.1.1 (2017-05-23)
------------------

- Fix some documentation


0.1.0 (2017-05-20)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
